Name: SONOHIGURASHI VS. TOUHOU UNIVERSE2
About the game: 90's-style 2D fighting action in which real-life men fight in cosplay. A major update version of the second series. * This work is a secondary creation game work based on the Touhou Project. This game is This is a major update version of 'sonohigurashi vs touhou2' sold in 2012. 49 playable characters and 49 stages in total! Of course, there is a dedicated BGM for every stage! ■Game mode [ARCADE] It is a mode to fight the CPU battle. Depending on conditions, boss branching and multi-ending. [VS] In this mode, you can play local matches with your friends. (Single [1 ON 1].) ■story With a new criminal, 'Gensokyo' and 'Hinamizawa' have once again become one. [Development tools] ・ 2D Fighting Maker 2nd
